title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 11 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Aug 11 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: Clay Travis takes on his local school board in Nashville over child mask mandates. Clay thinks the mom revolution against kid masks may become like the Tea Party. DeSantis threatens to withhold pay of school districts with mask mandates. Liberals put a lot of pressure on Texas and Florida to mask up. Will the school board revolution be the start of pushback? Clay and Buck say speaking out at school board meetings is the foundation of democracy. Our Federalist system (that Clay says we're fortunate to have) allows for each state to become a case study.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
